data.name: Config_AppReset_Body
data.value:
STOP! READ THIS FIRST!
Ensure you understand the specifics below before using the Application Reset functionality. It could cause potential loss of information and settings.

What Should I Know?
The application reset function was designed primarily for developers and system administrators that need to reset the system to it's out of the box, factory default, fresh smelling state. This function primarily un-does everything the setup wizard sets up behind the scenes. It even re-enables the setup wizard once complete. For those who require more detail here is what get's modified:

  • Setup Wizard Re-Enabled
  • Database Connection String is Removed (Data is not affected)
  • Active Directory Connection is severed
  • The Web.Config file is decrypted
  • All App Settings are reset
  • For security reasons the application is taken offline (Protection from evil-doers)

Only do this if you want to re-configure the application!

data.name: Config_AppReset_Conf
data.value: return confirm('Last chance to say no! This action also decrypts the membership section after it is cleared.\r\n\r\nAre you sure you want to reset the application?');

data.name: Config_Domain_FQDNNoEdit
data.value: You cannot edit the domain name once the system is up and running. Use the application reset instead.

data.name: Config_Domain_Notice
data.value: When you click save the system will first attempt to validate the credentials supplied before saving them.

data.name: Config_Domain_Success_Message
data.value: The domain settings were tested and applied successfully. uManage verified the credentials supplied using {0}

data.name: Config_SMTP_Body
data.value:
Why Use SMTP?
Simple actually; many of the features of uManage for communication between users, administrators and even help desk technicians utilize the SMTP server to send notifications or alerts to the user. While they are not vital to the system to run it is usually easier to allow users to get an e-mail and then check the website thanks to the links in the e-mail instead of periodically checking the website every few hours or minutes.

Is it Secure?
It's never totally secure, however uManage will encrypt the settings in the application configuration file for safe keeping. It is always up to the SMTP Server and Mail Administrator to ensure proper anti-virus and spam protection is in place. We can't do that for you. Please note that regardless of your use of Exchange you still need to specify an SMTP address to your Exchange Internal Relay Server in order for uManage to send e-mail. This makes it a little safer too, since you can then rely on Exchange to thwart any attacks.

The Magic!

data.name: Config_SMTP_ConfPass_NoCompare
data.value:
Invalid Entry!
The password verification did not match the original password. Please ensure both password's match.

data.name: Config_SMTP_Failure_Description
data.value: uManage was either unable to test or save the settings. Please check your selections and try again.

data.name: Config_SMTP_From_InValid
data.value:
Invalid Entry!
You must enter a valid e-mail address.

data.name: Config_SMTP_From_Required
data.value:
Invalid Entry!
You must enter an e-mail address for the SMTP service to use.

data.name: Config_SMTP_Notice
data.value: When you click save uManage will attempt to send a test e-mail message to the address below before saving the settings.

data.name: Config_SMTP_Port_Invalid
data.value:
Invalid Entry!
You must enter a valid TCP/IP Port to use.

data.name: Config_SMTP_Port_Required
data.value:
Invalid Entry!
You must enter a TCP/IP Port to use.

data.name: Config_SMTP_Server_Required
data.value:
Invalid Entry!
You must enter a server URL to connect to.

data.name: Config_SMTP_Success_Description
data.value: The SMTP settings were validated and properly saved to the configuration file. uManage will now send e-mail notifications using the updated settings. Please check the test account for a confirmation message.

data.name: Config_SMTP_Test_InValid
data.value:
Invalid Entry!
You must enter a valid e-mail address.

data.name: Config_SMTP_Test_Required
data.value:
Invalid Entry!
You must enter an e-mail address to use for testing.

data.name: Config_SMTP_User_Required
data.value:
Invalid Entry!
You must enter a username for the SMTP service to use.

data.name: Menu_Config_AppReset_Description
data.value: Reset the application to the defaults

data.name: Menu_Config_Domain_Description
data.value: View and modify the current domain connection and configuration

data.name: Menu_Config_SMTP_Description
data.value: View and modify the current SMTP Server configuration

data.name: Menu_Config_Database_Description
data.value: View and modify the current database configuration

data.name: Config_Database_Body
data.value: Due to the possibility of the application failing to run when SQL changes are made the current configuration can only be viewed, it cannot be modified from within the application. To make changes to the configuration use either IIS' Management Snap-In or Reset the application to re-create the database.

data.name: Config_Domain_Submit_Conf
data.value: return confirm('Changing the user credentials used to connect to the domain could cause problems or fail in future requests causing users and administrators unable to access the application. In addition updating the configuration will cause the application to recycle which could cause in session users to experience a time-out or loose their work.\r\n\r\nAre you sure you want to continue?');

data.name: Config_SMTP_Submit_Conf
data.value: return confirm('You are about to make changes to the current SMTP server settings. If the settings provided are not accurate it could cause notifications to fail to send. In addition updating the configuration will cause the application to recycle which could cause in session users to experience a time-out or loose their work.\r\n\r\nAre you sure you want to continue?');

data.name: Config_Dash_Suggestions_Body
data.value:
We need your help to better define what would be useful in this dashboard. Please submit comments and feedback at CodePlex using either the Discussion board or the Issue Tracking tools.

http://umanage.codeplex.com

data.name: Menu_Config_Dash_Description
data.value: View an overview of current configuration tasks

data.name: Menu_Config_Portal_Description
data.value: View and modify user portal configuration

data.name: Config_Portal_Body
data.value: Use the settings below to configure how the user portal displays to the users.

data.name: Config_Portal_Submit_Conf
data.value: return confirm('You are about to make changes to how the User Portal allows users to interact with the system. It also may allow unwanted changes to your Active Directory database. In addition updating the configuration will cause the application to recycle which could cause in session users to experience a time-out or loose their work.\r\n\r\nAre you sure you want to continue?');

data.name: Config_Portal_Failure_Description
data.value: uManage was unable to save your configuration changes. Please go back and try again.

data.name: Config_Portal_Success_Description
data.value: Your changes were successfully saved to the configuration file and are now in effect.

data.name: Menu_Config_Users_Description
data.value: View and Modify the users that are allowed to access the Admin Portal of uManage

data.name: Config_Users_Body
data.value:
The list of users below has been granted access to the Administrative Portal of uManage. From here you can add and remove users from the list below. In addition you can also change user's group memberships from this panel as well.

Role Definitions
Admin - This is the primary role intended for users to manage the domain and the users within it.
System - This is the system administrator role intended for making configuration changes to uManage, including this tool.

data.name: Menu_Config_OfficeLoc_Description
data.value: Manage the Office Locations for the User Portal

data.name: Config_OfficeLoc_Body
data.value: Organizations have the option of enabling a drop down list for the Office location field in Active Directory. By enabling this option you will force users to select a predefined location when selecting their office. When disabled users can enter their location into a free-form textbox.

data.name: Config_OfficeLoc_Failure_Message
data.value: Failed to update the location because:

data.name: Config_OfficeLoc_Success_Message
data.value: Saved the location changes to the system.

data.name: Config_Dash_Dialog_Message
data.value: This timeline only shows configuration and system-wide changes. It does not reflect any administrative or user changes, however it does work the same way as the main system timeline.

data.name: Config_Dash_Empty_Message
data.value: You're timeline is currently empty. Don't worry nothing is really wrong, the system just has not logged any messages worth showing yet. Remember this timeline is only for System Messages, all other messages will show up in the main Administration timeline.

data.name: Menu_Admin_Dash_Description
data.value: View an overview of the current users and system history

data.name: Menu_Admin_UserManage_Description
data.value: View and manage the details and settings for an employee

data.name: Emp_Details_Photo_Fail_Msg
data.value: For some reason the system was not able to change the photo submitted or clear the existing photo. Try again or contact an administrator for more assistance. Here is the exact reason: {0}.

data.name: Emp_Details_Save_Fail_Msg
data.value: The system was unable to to save the information. Here is the exact reason: {0}.

data.name: Emp_Details_Save_Success_Msg
data.value: The information for the employee has been saved. It should take effect immediately, however some applications may need to be restarted to get the new changes.

data.name: Menu_Config_NewUser_Description
data.value: Manage the default settings for new users that are added through uManage

data.name: Config_NewUser_Body
data.value: You must enable user creation before you can modify any settings. If you leave user creation turned off uManage will not allow Admin users to create new user accounts, they will all need to be created manually.

data.name: Config_NewUser_FormatStrings
data.value:
$fi$ - First Initial
$fname$ - First Name
$mi$ - Middle Initial
$mname$ - Middle Name
$li$ - Last Initial
$lname$ - Last Name

data.name: Config_NewUser_FormatTest_Missing
data.value:
Required Field Missing!
You must supply a default username format.

data.name: Config_NewUser_Save_Fail_Msg
data.value: The settings could not be saved because of this error: {0}

data.name: Config_NewUser_Save_Success_Msg
data.value: The defaults have been saved and will be used for all future user accounts.

data.name: Menu_Admin_AddUser_Description
data.value: Add a new employee to your organization

data.name: Emp_Add_Disabled_Message
data.value: An administrator has either disabled adding employees using this system or has not yet configured the system to add new employees. Please contact your administrator for more information.

data.name: Emp_Add_Submit_Fail_Msg
data.value: The employee could not be added to the system because: {0}

data.name: Emp_Add_Submit_Success_Msg
data.value: The employee was added to the system. The system will send you an e-mail in a few minutes with instructions and login information for the new employee, please deliver it to the new employee.
